page.title: 01SOUTH STRATHAVEN
page.content: Strathaven is a small town of just over 6000 people.It could be described as a dormitory town for many people go to work in Glasgow,Hamilton or East Kilbride. There are no large factories in Strathaven and the largest source of employment is Strathaven Academy,though in this case a number of those employed come from outside the town. The main shopping area is the Common Green though the shops are mosty small and most folk also shop in E.K. or Hamilton.There are four churches,three primary schools and a secondary here.The town lies a few miles west of the A74/M74 route to England.The surrounding area is mainly agricultural and a market is regularly held in the town.Strathaven Toffee is a well known delicacy produced here.
